scripts.setup-client: cd korepetycje-client && npm install && ng build && cd ..
scripts.setup-client:prod: cd korepetycje-client && npm install && ng build --prod && cd ..
scripts.setup-server: cd korepetycje-server && npm install && tsc && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run setup-client && npm run setup-server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run setup-client:prod && npm run setup-server
